msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; there are some lines on the back of col. 98 and in the intercolumniation on the Verso
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: Regularly cut at the left hand side; almost regularly cut at the top; I rregularly cut at the right and bottom sides. Although the numbers of col. 98 in the publication, P.Mich.224, p.251, is written without brackets, the numbers is no longer visible as the fibers have been lost since the time of publication. (MA)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the tax payer. A big dot of ink can be noticed at the top of the Recto; as well as on verso. The scribe has washed out line, which supposed to be number 23. There are 12 lines on the back of col. 98, and 4 in the intercolumniation. (MA)
